posts.title: Batman Begins
posts.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
posts.actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Holmes

posts.title: Joker
posts.plot: In Gotham City, mentally-troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: "The Joker".
posts.actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy

posts.title: Ad ovest di Paperino
posts.plot: Marta, a lonely woman, takes with her Augusto and Antonio to scour the whole city for a whole day, looking for something absurd: pigeons turning into men or she will die.
posts.actors: Athina Cenci, Alessandro Benvenuti, Francesco Nuti, Giancattivi

posts.title: Jurassic Park
posts.plot: A pragmatic Paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
posts.actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough

posts.title: Pippo Barzizza e Una Vita per la Musica
posts.plot: From the Pathè Baby 9.5 archive footage shot by Pippo Barzizza since 1928, this short film shows the Pippo's life with his wife Tatina, and his daughter Isa Barzizza. The title was written ...

posts.title: Game of Thrones
posts.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.
posts.actors: Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington

posts.title: Pinocchio
posts.plot: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.
posts.actors: Mel Blanc, Don Brodie, Stuart Buchanan, Walter Catlett
posts.director: Norman Ferguson, T. Hee, Wilfred Jackson, Jack Kinney, Hamilton Luske, Bill Roberts, Ben Sharpsteen
